subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: MASON, Ohio, Aug. 19 (AP) — Top-ranked Roger Federer reached another measure of tennis greatness Sunday, winning his 50th tournament title by defeating James Blake, 6-1, 6-4, in the Western & Southern Financial Group Masters.
snippet: MASON, Ohio, Aug. 19 (AP) — Top-ranked Roger Federer reached another measure of tennis greatness Sunday, winning his 50th tournament title by defeating James Blake, 6-1, 6-4, in the Western & Southern Financial Group Masters.
